name: The House On Holland Hill
description:
The House On Holland Hill is a 15-20 minute visual novel, originally made during an Idle Thumbs gamejam.

You assume the role of Luigi, a zesty food delivery driver, and your first delivery takes you to a newly-built house outside of town. It's an imposingly modern villa, like one you would see on ArchDaily's Instagram account; Smooth angular surfaces, a big driveway, lots of windows to peek into... You have a chat with the charismatic owner, hand over the food, and get on your way.

Before long, you start to receive more orders from this address. You develop a rapport with the home owners, and over time, you start to get the impression that not all is well behind the front door of The House On Holland Hill.

Featuring:
  • 3D environment to wander around in
  • Hand-painted 2D characters to meet
  • A game length that won't waste your time
  • 13 deliveries to make
  • Four possible endings to arrive at
  • Peep on the lives of the inhabitants of the house
  • Get involved or remain professional
  • Find out what's going on behind closed doors
  • Navigate interactive dialogues
  • Keyboard and controller support
